title: FS: Lot Of 10 1914 B18 Blankets Including 2 HOF'ers + 1 BVG Graded SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: Lot Of 10 1914 B18 Blankets Including 2 HOF'ers + 1 BVG Graded SOLD
posts.post_content:
Pretty nice lot here. The price is SOLD delivered PayPal friends/family. I am only selling as a lot. Thank you for looking.

Joe K.
